metadata.title: CVE-2024-40908 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Set run context for rawtp test_run callbacksyzbot reported crash when rawtp program executed through thetest_run interface calls bpf_get_attach_cookie helper or anyother helper that touches task->bpf_ctx pointer.Setting the run context (task->bpf_ctx pointer) for test_runcallback.
